content: of f2tog in the prev round 8b 3 times 1f 1hdc in top of same st working in front of half_double_crochet 1f around post of same st 1f around first leg of f2tog in the prev round 2b 1dc in each of 25 chain 2b 1f 1hdc in top of same st working in front of half_double_crochet 1f around post of same st 1f around first leg of f2tog in the prev round 8b twice working behind 1st f of this round 1f around last f in the previous round 1hdc into top of same st join 136 sts round 51 ch2 skip 1st and 2nd sts btr f in each of skipped st skip st with btr 6b rightcross leftcross 1b 25f 1b rightcross leftcross 6b 3 times rightcross leftcross 1b 25f 1b rightcross leftcross 6b twice rightcross join b round 52 ch2 1b leftcross 4b rightcross 2b leftcross 25f rightcross 2b leftcross 4b 3 times rightcross 2b leftcross 25f rightcross 2b leftcross 4b twice rightcross 1b join b round 53 ch2 2b leftcross 2b rightcross 4b skip 2 sts 1dc in top of st working in front of double_crochet 1f around post of the 1st skipped stitch f2tog around post of the 2nd skipped st and around post of the st at the base of double_crochet 23f f2tog 1f working behind f and f2tog double_crochet in top of the st at the base of the first leg f2tog skip 2sts with left leg of f2tog and f 4b leftcross 2b rightcross twice 2b twice join © tulip bag crochet by svetlana rogatykh 25 top edge and interior work in spirals do not join and do not turn at the end of round mark the first stitch in each round round 54 the joining stitch of the previous row is the first stitch in this row work sl sts through both loops all around starting in the second stitch one slip_stitch in each b and one slip_stitch for every 2 f except the handle on each handle crochet 25 sl sts round 55 ch1 count as first single_crochet insert your hook into the back of a slip_stitch the bar section and single_crochet into each st mark first and 25th sts on each handle round 56 -59 126 single_crochet blo in each round round 60 continue crocheting single_crochet blo crochet chain 25 instead of single_crochet on the handles round 61 -65 126 single_crochet blo in each round after the last st of the last row slip_stitch and cut the yarn © tulip bag crochet by svetlana rogatykh 26 © tulip bag crochet by svetlana rogatykh 27 finishing from the front side connect the outer and inner sides of the handles with the sl sts one slip_stitch in each b and one slip_stitch for every 2 f video sew the lining if desired to do this measure the width and depth of the inside of the bag according to these measurements sew the lining and sew it to the inner part
